## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G22330](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G22330)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtRuvBL1, ATTIP49A, RIN1, RuvBL1, RVB1</u>
- **Gene Name:** RESISTANCE TO PSEUDOMONAS SYRINGAE PV MACULICOLA INTERACTOR 1, RuvB-like 1, Pontin
- **Description:**   P-loop containing nucleoside triphosphate hydrolases superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
